A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: So many dropped subplots from Episode 7. It feels like Rian read the wikipedia page as research when he was writing the story for this movie. Snoke is pretty much a joke and gives no answers as to his character. Phasma's character is once again tossed aside like trash. \n\nThere is NO progression of the story at all. How the last movie ends\, is exactly how this one ends. No one changes sides\, no one side gains an advantage. Zero progression.
